title: Quests/Skill requirements

properties.name: description
properties.value: This page lists the skill requirements for each quest. An asterisk (*) denotes that a boost may be used to reach the requirement.

content:
Levels required
to complete every quest
Total level: 1450
50 50 72*
50 70 70
65 70 62*
60 60 70*
50 70 66
75 60 71*
55 69 70
70 70
85 200 ----
Temporary boosts
may be used in some quests

This page lists the skill requirements for each quest. An asterisk (*) denotes that a boost may be used to reach the requirement.
